short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official aBowman Hamster Chrome extension.  Now working without Flash thanks to Ruffle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This lively pet hamster will keep you company throughout the day. 

Watch him run on his wheel, drink water, and eat the food you feed him by clicking your mouse.

Change the colors of your hamster to make him your own.
